about-section.description-2: Outside of programming, I enjoy listening to music. You can find out what I'm currently listening to in real-time on Spotify. I'm also a huge football fan, and obviously, my team is Boca Juniors ðŸ‡¸ðŸ‡ª

universidad-nacional-del-comahue.title: Full Stack Developer
universidad-nacional-del-comahue.description: While studying for my bachelor's in software and web development, I developed and maintained web applications for my university career. I worked on the front and back end, using technologies like React, Laravel, and MySQL.

contact-section.title: Contact
contact-section.description: Feel free to get in touch with me if you have any questions, project inquiries, or if you would like to discuss a collab!. I'm always open to new opportunities and challenges.

last-name.regex: Last name must contain only letters

email.email: Email must be a valid email address

email.max: Email must be less than 100 characters
